title: Kia Soul YouTube Brand Channel
description: YouTube brand channel for UGC video contest · HTML5 site featuring in-page animated galleries and carousels · Embedded User-Generated Content · Video theater with voting and commenting · Optimized mobile version for phones

title: Genentech gView Social Media Visualizer
description: Live social media visualizer and intranet viewer · Displays Genentech's CMS content plus Twitter, Facebook, Flickr · Back end harvests and displays real-time social chatter about the brand and products

title: Verizon Campaign Website
description: HTML5 campaign website showcasing Verizon's mobile devices · Icons animate around ellipse and scale dynamically · Top nav allows filtering by device type · Site uses Thismoment API for dynamic content and Facebook and Twitter posts

title: Daily Shot iOS App
description: Universal app for iPhone and iPad · Uses Twitter API to pull recent tweets and RSS to load latest posts by comedian/blogger Ali Wentworth · Sends users optional daily alerts when new content is posted

title: Proteus Website
description: Site architecture, design and build as part of complete rebranding for biotechnology company · Custom WordPress theme and CMS · Responsive design adapts dynamically to smaller screens of phones and tablets · As seen on The Colbert Report

title: Buick
description: HTML5 campaign website with dynamic content · Smooth animation on iPad as well as PC Browsers · Aggregates real-time social media from YouTube, Flickr, Facebook, Twitter and automotive blogs

title: Google Places SXSW
description: Multitouch experience for a live event featuring two networked 65" monitors with touch overlays · Air app integrating Google Maps API and custom database · Live voting allowed partygoers to rate their favorite Places and see results in realtime

title: Ongo Mobile Website
description: Cross-platform, cross-device personal news service · Back-end integration with Ongo API · Built with HTML5/CSS3 to provide consistent experience on Blackberry, Android, Windows Phone, WebOS and iOS browsers

title: Olympic Challenge YouTube Brand Channel & Minisite
description: Flash plus Papervision 3D · Allows users to submit videos to YouTube via Flash interface — a first · Accesses three different data sources for localization, text and videos

title: Oral-B Campaign
description: Flash campaign site plus YouTube channel and Facebook app · Leverages Thismoment CMS to showcase social media content · Experimental interface displays videos, photos and tweets

title: Golden Grahams Golden Grant
description: Flash video microsite that allows users to post story ideas via Twitter · Viewers vote and most popular stories are turned into animations

title: Google Nexus One
description: Branded YouTube channel with hybrid Flash/HTML interface · Papervision3D and groundbreaking Flash-based YouTube video player · Site scales dynamically as fresh content is added

title: Twitter Cooler MMX
description: Dynamically animated Flash environment · Sophisticated back end scours Twitter for search terms over specific times · Scrubbable timeline allows users to explore past tweets · Displays YouTube videos within Flash environment

title: The Cluster
description: Social network website for skateboarding community · Django-based CMS tracks locations of skate shops and spots across the US · Users can create profiles and upload videos from desktop or mobile devices

title: RockBand
description: Social network for EA’s Rock Band video game · Users can create profiles, make friends, share images, connect to game avatars · Fullscreen game footage and motion graphic interface · Real-time leaderboards

title: State Farm YouTube Brand Channel
description: Branded YouTube channel · Flash plus Away 3D interactive cube · Dynamically populated with full-motion videos using Thismoment API

title: GlidePath
description: Browser-based ER patient care management system · Treatments, tests and status at a glance · Networked system allows monitoring from multiple locations · Currently undergoing clinical trials

title: TakePart
description: Large-scale community site to promote education and support conversations around social causes · Drupal based CMS with Brightcove Video, Google Search Appliance, Baynote Personalization Engine

title: Tostitos Nolaf
description: Fullscreen video with multiple interactive video layers blended seamlessly · Dynamic bandwidth detection and playback optimization · Personalized dynamic video pranks
